item.title: Firmware-Mod-kit compilation error in Cygwin
item.description: Sorry, this is a wrong forum for cramfs questions.
item.dc:creator: Lasse Collin

item.title: Firmware-Mod-kit compilation error in Cygwin
item.description:
the ./configure is fine, when I try the make command is when I hit the error. Anyone knows how to solve this?

cramfsck.c:54:22: fatal error: linux/fs.h: No such file or directory
compilation terminated.
make[1]: [<builtin>: cramfsck] Error 1
make[1]: Leaving directory '/home/Admin_8_1/New folder/fmk/src/cramfs-2.x'
make: [Makefile:9: all] Error 2
t

Thanks
item.dc:creator: Jeffery Gibson
